column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Fantastic museum! A must see if visiting Chicago. The museum is huge and very diverse
column5: and European art. The Impressionist paintings are beautiful and there are several Monet and Van Gogh's. The rooms are spacious so everyone has lots of room to spread out. I also found the Native American and South American artifacts fascinating. There is art from many periods from BC to modern. There is a ton of art here so if you like to read the captions
column6: you can be here all day. Not sure if kids will appreciate it as much but otherwise highly recommended.
